name: fix-md-tables

scripts.check: pnpm run format && pnpm run lint && pnpm run test
scripts.release: pnpm run check && changelogen --release && git push --follow-tags

scripts.release:major: pnpm run check && changelogen --release --major && git push --follow-tags
